name: Dreamwalker Handguards
tooltip:
Dreamwalker HandguardsLevel 60

Rayne at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Dreamwalker Handguards if you bring her the following: 1 Desecrated Handguards, 8 Wartorn Leather Scraps, 5 Cured Rugged Hides and 1 Nexus Crystal.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Handguards
- Wartorn Leather Scrap x 8
- Cured Rugged Hide x 5
- Nexus Crystal
